summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of Lots 33 to 37, inclusive, Block 3, Hillman City Addition, Division No. 6, located on the north side of Morgan Street, between 39th Avenue South and 42nd Avenue South, with respect to Use District, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended, by adding thereto a new section numbered 2-37.
